```{r load_package}
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(lubridate)
```


```{r read_clean}
pols = read_csv("./data/pols-month.csv") %>% 
  clean_names()

gdp = read_csv("./data/gdp.csv") %>% 
  clean_names() %>% 
  mutate(value = as.numeric(value))
```

```{r combine_data}
pols2 = 
  pols$mon %>% lubridate::floor_date(unit = "month") %>% 
  mutate(pols,date = .) %>% 
  left_join(.,gdp,by = "date") %>% 
  select(-date)
```
